statements: UPDATE VolunteerPreferences SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='555-1234' WHERE volunteer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VolunteerPreferences SET name='Jane Smith', availability='{"monday": true, "friday": false}' WHERE volunteer_id='98765432-1234-5678-abcdef-0987654321';

UPDATE VolunteerPreferences SET availability = '{"Monday":"Morning","Wednesday":"Afternoon"}', preferences = '{"area":"Education","age_group":"Children"}' WHERE volunteer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE VolunteerPreferences SET email = 'john.doe@gmail.com', phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', preferences = '{"area":"Healthcare","age_group":"Seniors"}' WHERE volunteer_id = '98765432-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef';

UPDATE Volunteer_Availability SET available_times = 'Afternoon' WHERE volunteer_id = '456e7890-f12c-34a5-b678-567821740001';

UPDATE volunteer_preferences SET email='updated_email@example.com' WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
UPDATE task_assignments SET deadline='2023-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE task_id = 2;

UPDATE VolunteerSkills SET proficiency_level='Expert' WHERE volunteer_id=2005;
